pages.text: Toretoises are neutral creatures that will spawn deep underground.$(br2)Toretoises will sink in water, and are immune to drowning, fall, and fire damage.$(br2)They will come with a random type of Ore (Coal, Copper, Iron, Lapis or Redstone).$(br)You may attack the Toretoise with a Pickaxe to have it drop that ore.
Toretoises do not breed. They do spawn like hostile creatures, so you can go back for more.

Feeding the Toretoise Cave Roots will make regenerate its ores, but when they does, it will enter an eating coldown for 1 minute.$(br2)You can automate this feeding process using a Feeding Trough. $(br2)If you attack a Tortoise without a Pickaxe, or when it has not ore, it will emit a shockwave attack. This will hit any non-Toretoise entities around, and redirect their aggro to you.
